issue.title: Differentiate between code lines added and comment lines added (and sizes of files/functions with/without comments)

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body: A patch that adds one line of code and ten lines of comments is likely different than a patch which adds eleven lines of comments!

issue.title: Collect size of files modified by the patch

repository.name: bugbug

issue.body:
This can be considered as one of the complexity measures (see #372).

(Depends on #377, I'll rebase this after it's merged)

body: #1159 is adding the complexities at file level, we should also do it at function level.
